title: Topic 003 Question 065
body: You have an Azure subscription that contains the resources shown in the following table.
You need to configure a solution to meet the following requirements:
•	App1 must be assigned a private endpoint.
•	Access to App1 from the internet must be routed via FD1.
What should you configure on FD1?
options: a security policy that redirects traffic
a rule that has the route configuration override action
an origin that enables the Azure Private Link service
